researchProjectDef.label: Weapon Assembly
researchProjectDef.description: This research will unlock the weapon assembly table that allows colonists to craft more weapons.

researchProjectDef.label: Ballistics
researchProjectDef.description: This project will allow colonists to study mechanics that deals with the launching, flight, behavior, and effects of projectiles, especially bullets, unguided bombs, rockets. It is the science or art of designing and accelerating projectiles so as to achieve a desired performance. Also unlocks "Shurikens" for colonists to craft.

researchProjectDef.label: Ammunition Production
researchProjectDef.description: This project will allow colonists to craft ammunitions and projectiles for weapons.

researchProjectDef.label: Close Quarters Battle
researchProjectDef.description: This project will allow colonists to craft more advanced weapons that are designed for close quarters battle.(This is a prerequisite to:Pistols,Shotguns,Submachine Guns and some Melee Weapons)

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Bows
ResearchProjectDef.description: This project will allow you to craft some more advanced bows for ranged combat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Melee Weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: This project will allow you to craft some more advanced knives designed for close quarters combat.

researchProjectDef.label: Throwable Grenades
researchProjectDef.description: This research will allow colonists to craft throwable grenades at Weapon Assembly Table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pistols
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research will allow colonists to craft pistols at Weapon Assembly Table.

researchProjectDef.label: Submachine Guns
researchProjectDef.description: This research will allow colonists to craft submachine guns at Weapon Assembly Table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shotguns
ResearchProjectDef.description: This research will allow colonists to craft shotguns at Weapon Assembly Table.

researchProjectDef.label: Rifles
researchProjectDef.description: This research will allow colonists to craft rifles at Weapon Assembly Table.

researchProjectDef.label: Sniper Rifles
researchProjectDef.description: This research will allow colonists to craft high precision sniper rifles at Weapon Assembly Table.

researchProjectDef.label: Heavy Weapons
researchProjectDef.description: This research will allow colonists to craft heavy weapons at Weapon Assembly Table.
